careers.name: Science Stream
careers.tagline: Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Math focus for future innovation
careers.info: Science stream opens pathways for Engineering, Medicine, Research, and Technology careers. It provides a strong foundation in analytical thinking and problem-solving skills essential for modern careers in STEM fields.

careers.name: Commerce Stream
careers.tagline: Business, Accounting, Economics focus for commercial success
careers.info: Commerce stream leads to prestigious careers in CA, Banking, Finance, Management, and Entrepreneurship. It develops business acumen and financial literacy crucial for the corporate world.

careers.name: Arts/Humanities
careers.tagline: Literature, History, Psychology for creative and social careers
careers.info: Arts/Humanities stream nurtures creativity and critical thinking, leading to careers in Journalism, Psychology, Law, Civil Services, Teaching, and Creative Industries. It develops communication and analytical skills.

careers.name: Vocational Courses
careers.tagline: Practical skills training for immediate employment
careers.info: Vocational courses provide hands-on training in specific trades like Electrician, Plumber, Carpenter, Beauty & Wellness, Hospitality, and Retail. These courses offer quick entry into the job market with practical skills.

careers.name: Skill Based Courses
careers.tagline: Modern digital and technical skills for emerging careers
careers.info: Skill-based courses focus on Digital Marketing, Web Development, Graphic Design, Data Entry, Customer Service, and IT Support. These courses align with current market demands and offer flexible career options.

careers.name: Diploma Courses
careers.tagline: Specialized technical education for industry-ready professionals
careers.info: Diploma courses in Engineering, Computer Applications, Hotel Management, Fashion Design, and Pharmacy provide specialized knowledge and practical training, making students industry-ready in shorter duration.

careers.name: Entrance Exams
careers.info: Entrance exam preparation for JEE, NEET, CLAT, NDA, and other competitive exams. These exams open doors to top institutions and prestigious career paths with comprehensive coaching and guidance.

careers.name: Government Jobs
careers.tagline: Secure public sector employment with stability
careers.info: Government job preparation for SSC, Railway, Police, Banking, and other public sector positions. These jobs offer job security, good benefits, and opportunities to serve the nation with dignity and respect.
